attributes.action: Legalisation of Raw Milk for sale in supermarkets and shop and to be used in other products
attributes.additional_details:
Currently raw milk can only be sold to the public directly by a farmer, it is not legal to sell it in shops or supermarkets.

The health benefits for raw milk are vast and the health risks are 1000's of times lower than pasteurised milk.

We the public want the option to purchase raw milk from shops and supermarkets.
